name: Seize the Moment
text: You and your allies are poised to pounce whenever one of you scores a telling blow.
benefit: When an ally who also has this feat confirms a critical hit against an opponent that you also threaten, you can make an attack of opportunity against that opponent.
staminaText: When an ally with this feat threatens a critical hit but fails to confirm it, you can spend 5 stamina points to make your attack of opportunity anyway.
text_zh: 你和你的盟友擅长抓住发起凶猛攻击的时机。
benefit_zh: 当拥有此专长的盟友对在你威胁范围内的敌人造成重击时，你可以对该敌人发起一次借机攻击。
staminaText_zh: 当一个拥有这个专长的盟友重击威胁但是并未确认时，你仍可以通过消耗5点耐力做出借机攻击。
